actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Peter M. Jordan and Donna R. Jordan, husband and wife, and their children, Laurelee Ruth Jordan, Julienne Margaret Jordan, Jayne Michelle Jordan and Peter Andrew Jordan.

summary.text: Declares six named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Peter M. Jordan and Donna R. Jordan, husband and wife, and their children, Laurelee Ruth Jordan, Julienne Margaret Jordan, Jayne Michelle Jordan and Peter Andrew Jordan.
